I.name: Damnation
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Enemy {{tip|champions}}, large {{tip|minions}} and large {{tip|monsters}} that die near '''Thresh''' drop a ''Soul'' for 8 seconds. Epic monsters drop 2 ''Souls'', small minions and lesser monsters have a {{fd|33.{{recurring|3}}}}% chance to drop a ''Soul''.
'''Thresh''' automatically collects ''Souls'' near him or a placed ''{{ai|Dark Passage|Thresh}}''.
{{sbc|Soul:}} For each stack, '''Thresh''' gains {{sti|ap|{{as|1 ability power}}}} and {{sti|armor|{{as|1 '''bonus''' armor}}}}.
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Thresh's armor cannot increase through Growth#Increasing_Statistics.
Innate: Enemy champions, large minions and large monsters that die near Thresh drop a Soul for 8 seconds. Epic monsters drop 2 Souls, small minions and lesser monsters have a 33.Unknown value: recurring / 3% chance to drop a Soul.
Thresh automatically collects Souls near him or a placed Thresh's Dark Passage.
Soul: For each stack, Thresh gains 1 ability power and 1 bonus armor.
I.notes:
* ''Souls'' grant a small area of {{tip|sight}}.
* ''Souls'' are visible to allies and only become visible to enemies if their team has {{tip|sight}} of '''Thresh'''.
* The probability for ''souls'' dropping from small minions and monster on {{tip|Summoner's Rift}} starts at 33% but adjusts dynamically to match the expected quota of ''souls'' dropped (lowers if above, rises if below, remains if even). ''Souls'' collected are not considered when adjusting the probability.
* The maximum amount of ''souls'' '''Thresh''' can collect is 999,999, granting him {{as|749,999 '''bonus''' ability power}} and {{as|749,999 '''bonus''' armor}} ({{fd|99.99}}% damage reduction, reduced to {{fd|99.98}}% when hit by {{ii|Last Whisper}}).
* {{ci|Nunu|Nunu & Willump}} drop a soul each.

Q1.name: Death Sentence
description:
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Thresh''' throws out his scythe in the target direction, becoming {{tip|lockout|unable}} to move or attack while it is in flight.

The scythe catches the first enemy hit to deal {{as|magic damage}}, {{sti|cdr|reducing}} ''Death Sentence's'' cooldown by 3 seconds, and {{tip|stun|stunning}} and {{tip|true sight|revealing}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. '''Thresh''' will also mark the target ''Shackled'' for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, during which he is unable to declare basic attacks, and is {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 20% for 1 second.

While the target is {{tip|stun|stunned}}, '''Thresh''' tugs twice over {{fd|0.8}} seconds, {{tip|airborne|pulling}} the target a short distance with each tug. After {{fd|0.5}} seconds of hitting an enemy or instantly after hitting a {{tip|minion}} or {{tip|monster}}, '''Thresh''' can recast the ability while the target is ''Shackled'', which will cause him to stop tugging.

{{sbc|Recast - Deathly Leap:}} '''Thresh''' {{tip|dashes}} to the ''Shackled'' enemy, becoming able to attack again upon arrival. He can cast ''{{ai|Dark Passage|Thresh}}'' and ''{{ai|Flay|Thresh}}'' during the dash.
Q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Thresh throws out his scythe in the target direction, becoming unable to move or attack while it is in flight.

The scythe catches the first enemy hit to deal magic damage, reducing Death Sentence's cooldown by 3 seconds, and stunning and revealing them for 1.5 seconds. Thresh will also mark the target Shackled for 1.5 seconds, during which he is unable to declare basic attacks, and is slowed by 20% for 1 second.
While the target is stunned, Thresh tugs twice over 0.8 seconds, pulling the target a short distance with each tug. After 0.5 seconds of hitting an enemy or instantly after hitting a minion or monster, Thresh can recast the ability while the target is Shackled, which will cause him to stop tugging.
Recast - Deathly Leap: Thresh dashes to the Shackled enemy, becoming able to attack again upon arrival. He can cast Thresh's Dark Passage and Thresh's Flay during the dash.
Q1.notes:
* '''Thresh''' will track the target if they change locations.
** He will dash to the target's previous location if the target is too far away or moves beyond {{tt|2000|Estimated}} units.
{{Effect at cast time end}}
* '''Thresh''' will not tug if the target is too close to him.
* '''Thresh''' will turn his facing direction towards the cast direction only after ''Death Sentence's'' cast is complete.
** If '''Thresh''' is facing '''more''' than 90{{degree}} away from the cast direction in either direction, he will turn to face ''exactly'' 90{{degree}} away from the cast direction over the cast time, then turn towards the cast direction when the missile is fired.
** If '''Thresh''' is facing '''less''' than 90{{degree}} away from the cast direction, he will keep his facing direction until the missile is fired.
** [http://web.archive.org/web/0/http://na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?p=33837947#post33837947 This prevents the enemy from knowing where exactly '''Thresh''' is aiming at before the cast animation is complete.]
*''Death Sentence'' triggers on-cast effects (such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}) once at the start of the cast, and once at the end of the cast. It may trigger on-cast effects a third time when casting ''Deathly Leap''.
** This is because a separate spell is cast to prevent '''Thresh''' from facing towards the target direction immediately, which is (incorrectly) flagged to trigger on-cast effects.{{bug}}
* ''Deathly Leap'' has a maximum cast range. If '''Thresh''' or his victim move too far away from one another, ''Death Sentence'' will show its cooldown prematurely, preventing ''Deathly Leap'' from being cast.
** This behaves similarly to a tether range.
** If '''Thresh''' is already outside the maximum range when the scythe lands and the ''hook'' is created, ''Death Sentence'' will not be on cooldown{{bug}}, however actually casting ''Deathly Leap'' will cause it to fizzle unless '''Thresh''' has walked into range again.
* ''Death Sentence'' cannot be recast while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}.
* ''Death Sentence'' can be recast even while the target is {{tip|untargetable}}.
* Only ''Death Sentence's'' first chain tug puts the target {{tip|airborne}}. Outside the first ~{{fd|0.3}} seconds, the target is only stunned.{{bug}}
* ''Death Sentence'' will not {{tip|stun}} enemies that are {{tip|displacement immune}} or {{tip|cc-immune|immune to crowd control}} but the target will still be ''hooked'' and '''Thresh''' is still granted the ability to recast for his dash.
* '''Thresh''' will not tug at all if the {{tip|stun}} is not active on the target or if he used the recast.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block all of ''Death Sentence's'' effects, including the ''hook'' as well as prevent the cooldown reduction.
* ''Death Sentence's'' {{tip|stun}} duration is affected by {{tip|tenacity}} but the ''hook'' will always persist for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, unless the target uses a {{tip|cleanse|cleansing}} effect, in which case the ''hook'' is removed.
** ''Death Sentence's'' {{tip|stun}} will persist even if '''Thresh''' dies before the duration ends. The tug will not occur as '''Thresh''' is not alive.
{{ct|cast|spells=true,false,false,false,false}}

W.name: Dark Passage
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Thresh''' throws his lantern to the target location over {{fd|0.5}} seconds, which then grants {{tip|sight}} of its surroundings and lasts for 6 seconds while he remains nearby.

'''Thresh''' and the first allied champion to come near the lantern are granted a {{tip|shield}} for 4 seconds. An ally can select the lantern while in proximity of it, {{tip|dash|dashing}} to '''Thresh''' and gaining the shield.

An ally cannot select the lantern while {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}}, {{tip|ground|grounded}}, or {{tip|silence|silenced}}. The lantern will not expire from '''Thresh''' moving too far away if he is dashing with ''{{ai|Deathly Leap|Thresh}}''.
W.descriptionHtml:
Active: Thresh throws his lantern to the target location over 0.5 seconds, which then grants sight of its surroundings and lasts for 6 seconds while he remains nearby.
Thresh and the first allied champion to come near the lantern are granted a shield for 4 seconds. An ally can select the lantern while in proximity of it, dashing to Thresh and gaining the shield.
An ally cannot select the lantern while immobilized, grounded, or silenced. The lantern will not expire from Thresh moving too far away if he is dashing with Thresh's Deathly Leap.
W.notes:
* The dashing ally will track '''Thresh''' if he changes locations.
** They will dash to '''Thresh's''' previous location if he is too far away or moves beyond {{tt|2200|Estimated}} units.
* The lantern is considered a unit and can be targeted by an allied {{si|Teleport}}, ''{{ai|Leap Strike|Jax}}'', ''{{ai|Shunpo|Katarina}}'', and ''{{ai|Safeguard|Lee Sin}}''.
** It is {{tip|untargetable}} to enemies.
* The lantern's duration and maximum leash range are each displayed as a circle on the ground.
* ''Dark Passage'' is special cased to trigger {{ri|Guardian}}.

effects.str: • Shield Strength: (+ 2 per Thresh's Soul collected)

E1.name: Flay
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Thresh's''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, with the {{sti|{{as|AD}}}} ratio increasing over 10 seconds without basic attacking enemies.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Thresh''' sweeps his chain across the ground in a broad line and a radius around him, starting behind him and towards the target direction. Enemies hit are dealt {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|airborne|knocked}} 200 units in the target direction, and then {{tip|slow|slowed}} for 1 second upon landing.
E1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Thresh's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage, with the AD ratio increasing over 10 seconds without basic attacking enemies.
Active: Thresh sweeps his chain across the ground in a broad line and a radius around him, starting behind him and towards the target direction. Enemies hit are dealt magic damage, knocked 200 units in the target direction, and then slowed for 1 second upon landing.
leveling:
{{st|Minimum Bonus Magic Damage|{{fd|1.5}} per {{ai|Damnation|Thresh|Soul}} collected {{as|(+ 0% AD)}}}}
{{st|Maximum Bonus Magic Damage|{{fd|1.5}} per {{ai|Damnation|Thresh|Soul}} collected {{as|(+ {{ap|80 to 200}}% AD)}}}}
E1.notes:
* ''Flay's'' effects start at the start of the cast time. '''Thresh''' can cast other spells once the cast time completes, but remains unable to attack and move and use mobility spells (such as {{si|Flash}}) until the chain completed its way entirely.
* Applies {{tip|area damage}} on the ability and deals {{tip|proc damage}} on the enhanced basic attack.
* The knockback's {{tip|airborne}} debuff is set to last longer than the forced movement, but gets removed as soon as the forced movement from ''Flay'' ends or is overridden by another.
*''Flay's'' passive's buff icon changes colors depending on charge level. At 100%, ''Thresh's'' scythe will glow green and a sound effect will play.
<center><gallery id="noaccent" columns="4" captionalign="center" widths="64" orientation="square" spacing="small">
Thresh Flay 2.png|0 - 50%
Thresh Flay 3.png|50 - 75%
Thresh Flay 4.png|75% - 100%
Thresh Flay 5.png|100%
</gallery></center>
* {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} {{nie|Wind's Fury}} will apply ''Flay's'' passive to each enemy hit, with the secondary targets taking minimum damage (charge resets upon hitting the primary target).
* The enhanced attack applies other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the bonus damage cannot).
* ''Flay's'' passive enhanced attack can be {{tip|dodged}} (the enhanced attack is not consumed and the charge is not reset) and {{tip|blocked}} (the enhanced attack is consumed and the charge is reset).
* The empowered attack will not trigger against [[structures]] nor [[ward]]s.
** {{Pending for test}}: Enhanced attack's interactions with {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects (regarding both bonus damage and charge reset).
{{ct|cast|spells=true,false,false,false,false}}

R.name: The Box
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Thresh''' erects a pentagon of spectral walls around him that each last for 5 seconds. A wall will break upon enemy champion contact, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 99% for 2 seconds.
An enemy hit becomes immune to breaking another wall for 1 second after breaking one. Subsequent walls will deal no damage and {{tip|slow}} for only 1 second.
R.descriptionHtml:
Active: Thresh erects a pentagon of spectral walls around him that each last for 5 seconds. A wall will break upon enemy champion contact, dealing magic damage and slowing them by 99% for 2 seconds.
An enemy hit becomes immune to breaking another wall for 1 second after breaking one. Subsequent walls will deal no damage and slow for only 1 second.
R.notes:
{{Effect at cast time start}}
* ''The Box'' always uses [[quick cast]], regardless of player settings. <!-- It used to be direction cast, and then have the box face the target direction. Dunno if this change was intentional but I won't assume a bug here ~Caenen-->
** ''The Box'' always faces into the same direction (one of the walls is due North, and spreads West-East).
*** The cast indicator does not show this behavior.
* The corners of ''The Box'' are placed 400 units around '''Thresh'''.
** Each wall is {{fd|470.228}} units long.
** Each wall passes {{fd|323.607}} units from the center of ''The Box'' at the closest approach (ignoring its width).
** A pentagon has an angle of 72{{degree}} between each corner.
